content:
What could be an HL7v2 message type(s) to map/match the contactpoint-availabletime extension proposed by Da Vinci PDEX? I.e., to express operating hours for a certain entity such as practitioner, location, organization, etc., for example Monday to Friday 8:00 – 17:00.

The XTN data type does not have anything to code such construct. Segments like ORG (Practitioner Organization Unit) or PRA (Practitioner Detail) from the Personnel Management chapter do not help either. Is there anything else that I’m missing here.
